modName: Dance for skyrim Patch By valentina - DELETED
summary: Dance for skyrim with news style dance
descriptionHtml:
Dance in skyrim with 37 dances for female and male charapter 
                                               
                                    Recomended is skse and Fnis tool after installing this mod use tool fnis and scan animation and is done                                       

[img]https://web.archive.org/web/20140924001036im_/http://i43.tinypic.com/15mhjb7.png[/img] 
 
[list]
[*]Download the main file with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/modmanager/]Nexus Mod Manager.[/url]
[*]Activate the mod.
[/list]

[img]https://web.archive.org/web/20140924001036im_/http://i40.tinypic.com/2ekovhk.png[/img] 
 
[list]
[*]Uninstall the main file with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/modmanager/]Nexus Mod Manager[/url].
[*]
[/list]

when u load game chose charapter for dance chose u self with spell and find start dance spell and press z...

I forgot to say after download this mod dont forget to download Logo Patch dance to update logo :)

[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img924/8163/rWLH5Q.gif[/img]
